tooltip.arcanemod.refined_gemstone.toolt: The perfected form of the raw Hex Crystal.
A strange slate with a rune inscribed on it. It hums with the raw essence of progress.
A strange slate with a rune inscribed on it. It hums with the raw essence of strength.
